human.proprioception: Aware of body position while cooking
human.interoception: Feeling of hunger or satisfaction from cooking

need1.description: Prevent sauce spills on the table
need1.suggested robot solution: Use a mobile base to fetch paper towels from a nearby location to clean up the spills.

need2.description: Maintain cleanliness of the cooking area
need2.suggested robot solution: Retrieve cleaning spray and paper towels to assist in wiping down the table and cooking area after meal preparation.

need3.description: Ensure all cooking ingredients are within reach
need3.suggested robot solution: Reposition spice jars and sauce bottles closer to the stove using a robot arm to facilitate easier access.
